dcterms:creator: F. Kromp
dcterms:description: An expert-annotated dataset consisting of fluorescent nuclear images and annotations of various tissue origins and sample preparation types, acquired using different levels of magnification.
dcterms:title: Expert-annotated dataset of fluorescent nuclear images

dcterms:creator: J. Caicedo
J. Roth
A. Goodman
T. Becker
K. W. Karhohs
C. McQuin
S. Singh
A. E. Carpenter
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of nuclear images of cells grown on microscopy slides, used to evaluate deep learning strategies for nucleus segmentation.
dcterms:title: BBBC022 dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Alom
C. Yakopcic
T. M. Taha
V. K. Asari
dcterms:description: A dataset used in the 2018 Data Science Bowl Grand Challenge, which includes nuclear images of H&E stained tissue sections and immunofluorescently stained cells.
dcterms:title: 2018 Data Science Bowl Grand Challenge dataset
